alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 1:43AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southern Cheshire and southwestern Hillsborough Counties... At 143 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Chesterfield to Nashua...and moving south AT 20 MPH. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Jaffrey, Milford, Hollis, Swanzey, Peterborough, Winchester, Richmond, Rindge, Sharon, New Ipswich, Greenville, Fitzwilliam, Troy, Brookline, Mason, Chesterfield, Hudson, Temple and Marlborough. This also includes... Mount Monadnock. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough
